TEST27
  FILON_COS estimates the integral of.
  F(X) * COS ( T * X )
 
  Integrate F(X)*COS(T*X):
  with F(X)=1, X, X**2.
 
  A =    .0000000000000000    
  B =    6.283185307179586    
  NTAB =     11
  H =    .6283185307179586    
 
       T                      Approximate             Exact
 
     1.000000000000000     -0.1905476522093207E-15 -0.2449293598294706E-15

     1.000000000000000       12.56637061435916       12.56637061435916    
 
     2.000000000000000     -0.2590075573475023E-15 -0.2449293598294706E-15

     10.00000000000000     -0.2790294798406905E-15 -0.2449293598294706E-15

  with F(X)=1, X, X**2.

TEST29

  The Y values are all POSITIVE, so we expect
  every partial integral to be positive as well.
